skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Isuzu.
skins.selfIntroduction: Sakura Empire, Nagara-class light cruiser, Isuzu, reporting in! I participated in battles at the Lesser Sunda Islands, Solomon Islands, and Guadalcanal. I've fought alongside many famous ships, so you've got to work hard to try and have as good of a reputation as I do!
skins.acquisition: Woah! You... you scared me~! Oh, it's you, my Commander! I'm Isuzu... You're not here to pick on me, are you?
skins.login: Aaaaaah!!! Commander! Don't scare me like that...
skins.details: *Cries*... I'm so glad that you're still this gentle with me, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It feels creepy at night without any lights on, don't you think...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've seen plenty of things in this world! You won't scare me so easily.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uwa! It's touching me! It's touching me!

skins.shipDescription: Retrofit complete! ...Umm, Commander? ...Wh-what's the matter? Do I really look that different...?!
skins.acquisition: Retrofit complete! ...Umm, Commander? ...Wh-what's the matter? Do I really look that different...?!
skins.login: Gyah?! ...Commander, are you trying to scare me on purpose?!
skins.details: Commander, you've always been so kind to me~ Thank you~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Y-you saw something weird?! Wh-wh-where?! ...Jeez! Don't scare me like that!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Nagara said that I looked cuter before, but I think that's just because she likes to dote on me...!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Kinu seems like the dependable type, but she sometimes gives off really scary vibes... Ugh, I just don't understand her.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did I become a bit more dependable?

skins.shipDescription: There's many monsters roaming around during Halloween... B-but I'm not scared, okay?! ... Umm, err, uh... Can I hold your hand?
skins.acquisition: There's many monsters roaming around during Halloween... B-but I'm not scared, okay?! ... Umm, err, uh... Can I hold your hand?
skins.login: C-C-C-Commander! Trick or... o-or... I can't do it...!
skins.details: A-all those Halloween monsters are just people in costumes, right?! ... There aren't any real ones roaming around, right?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Monsters aren't real... Monsters aren't real... M-m-monsters aren't real....!
skins.secretaryIdle2: W-w-why do they make even the pumpkins look scary?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: L-l-looks like everyone's enjoying Halloween... I-I-I-I'm not shuddering, okay?!
skins.secretaryTouch: You make me feel safer than anyone else, Commander...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *Eeek*?! I-I'll turn you into a frog!

skins.shipDescription: Commander? I only came here to help wrap up all the presents for tomorrow, n-not because the fireplace is too cozy and I don't want to get up...
skins.acquisition: Commander? I only came here to help wrap up all the presents for tomorrow, n-not because the fireplace is too cozy and I don't want to get up...
skins.login: Two people sitting in front of the fireplace like this... feels a bit like family.
skins.details: My sisters wanted to dress up as Santa Claus and go around handing presents to kids... I didn't go with them because I'm not good with the dark.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's so cozy right next to the fireplace... There are even fuzzy Manjuus to cuddle~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Um... Commander, what kind of presents should I give to everyone?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've already done my research. There are no ghost stories or anything of the sort related to Christmas... R-right, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Are... you trying to share my body heat?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I knew it! You were trying to take advantage of me!
